name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Classic Italian pasta with rich meat sauce.
instructions: Cook beef with garlic and onion

name: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy and flavorful chicken curry with coconut milk.
instructions: Pour in coconut milk and simmer
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
description: Quick and healthy mixed vegetable stir fry.
instructions: Add garlic and stir fry vegetables
Add soy sauce and cook for 2-3 minutes
Serve hot with rice or noodles

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy breakfast pancakes served with syrup.
instructions: Cook batter on a greased pan until golden
Serve with butter and maple syrup

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Beef Tacos
description: Tasty beef tacos with fresh toppings.
instructions: Cook beef with onions and seasoning
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Healthy grilled salmon with lemon and herbs.
instructions: Marinate salmon with olive oil, garlic, lemon, and herbs
Preheat grill and cook salmon for 6-8 minutes each side

name: Omelette
instructions: Whisk eggs with milk, salt, and pepper
Pour in eggs and cook until set
Add vegetables and cheese, fold and serve

name: Fruit Smoothie
instructions: Combine all ingredients in a blender

name: Chocolate Brownies
instructions: Mix in sugar, eggs, and vanilla
